availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William. D. McGinnis (Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary McGinnis. Father of Jesse McGinnis, Fannie McGinnis, Minnie McGinnis, and Maggie McGinnis.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Precinct 2, p. 12.
Find A Grave, "William D. McGinnis (January 21, 1833-January 11, 1889)," Memorial #27290113, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27290113 (accessed May 23, 2018).
